appearance.TITLE: New User Screen
appearance.DESCRIPTION: Display a form contains all field to create new User. Submit form will post data to /user/create. If create successfully, please redirect to '/user/'. If not, please display error message.

descriptions.description: Create new user in database by data from request.

appearance.TITLE: View Screen
appearance.DESCRIPTION: This screen will have 2 button: Edit, Delete. 'Edit' button is used get edit user form at /post/edit/:id with id will be its user id. 'Delete' button is used to get delete at /post/delete/:id with id will be its user id.

appearance.TITLE: Update Screen
appearance.DESCRIPTION: Screens contains form displays all the information of single User record. Submit form will post data to /user/edit/:id. If updated successfully, please redirect to '/user/'. Otherwise, please display error message.

descriptions.description: Update information of user by data from request.

appearance.TITLE: List All Screen
appearance.DESCRIPTION: Screen will displayed all users as a list, each of element will have three buttons to view, update and delete user. 'View' button will get detail view of User at /user/detail/:id with id will be its user id. 'Update' button will get edit form at /user/edit/:id with id will be its user id. 'Delete' button get delete at /user/delete/:id with id will be its user id. Screen will have a search bar to search user by username.

descriptions.description: Find all existing users in database.

relationships.title: List All Screen -> New User Screen
relationships.description: List of users contains button to create new user.

relationships.title: List All Screen -> Update Screen
relationships.description: List of posts contains button to update existed user.
